name: The Enforcer (Methodic Solutions)
overview: A series of tongue-in-cheek lessons and shooting exercises simulating law enforcement professional training including dodging bullets and target recognition exercises. Released under the name Police in Italy's Go Games n.30 (marzo 1988) and Scuola Polizia in multiple Pubblirome/Edigamma publications including Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - 100 games 90 (1990).
